testcase.name: User is able to create Opportunitie
testcase.system-out: Given Open the Salesforce Website...........................................passed When verify the Salesforce page title.......................................passed Then Login with valid username and password "vedant.jagani@campingworld.com.test" and "Welcome2019*".passed And Click login button......................................................passed And Verify Salesforce Home page title.......................................passed Then Click on the Opportunities tab.........................................passed Then Click on the New button................................................passed Then Select a record type and click Next....................................passed And Populate New Opportunity RV Sales fields................................passed Then Click the Save button..................................................passed
